metadata.title: CVE-2024-43905 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/pm: Fix the null pointer dereference for vega10_hwmgrCheck return value and conduct null pointer handling to avoid null pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
